content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. Can I please get your name to get started with your plumbing request?
Just need to fix a leaky kitchen sink. Why do you need my name?
We use your name to make your booking experience more personalized and to keep accurate records for your appointment. Would you be able to provide your name so we can continue?
I'd rather not give that out. Can you schedule without it?
Unfortunately, we need a name to complete your appointment booking. If you change your mind, Iâ€™ll be here to help you further!
reason: Customer refused to provide name; unable to proceed with booking.
